data.name: TRESPASSER 2
data.detailed_description:
TRESPASSER 2--the sequel to the game about the common childhood fear of being home alone, and someone breaks into your household. This time around, the tables have turned, and you are now the TRESPASSER!

Seek out vengeance for the torment you have received earlier in your life and put an end to this story! Find different weapons such as a hammer, sickle, or even craft a broom with nails and attack the previous TRESPASSER and fight him one-on-one! Don’t be too confident however… he is not alone this time around! The enemy is now capable of duplicating himself. These duplicate enemies have the same abilities as the main TRESPASSER, but you cannot fight them as they are ghosts!

You have the choice of what you wish to do first to break into the house. Use a ladder and climb onto the rooftop and sneak through the windows, lockpick the front or garage door and play a minigame to gain access, or create a distraction and hide to get easy access to the house! Look around the environment and find tools to help you progress further into the game.

Discover different endings and dialogue snippets to understand more of what is going on here, and piece together the past that has never been told before.

Gain access to extra features such as cheat codes and collectibles to add to your gameplay experience!

data.short_description: A first-person action horror game about breaking into your enemy's house and seeking vengeance for the torment you have received in your past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-10110U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for certain gameplay.
  • Additional Notes: Lowest quality settings recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-11900H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for certain gameplay.
  • Additional Notes: Highest quality settings recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains minor bloodshed, violence that leads to death, horror elements such as jumpscares, and foul language.
